ceci-daily-counter/description: Counts daily progress toward your goals. Tells you how much time you have left and resets at the end of the day.
ceci-daily-counter/countUp/description: Increment the total by the increment value
ceci-daily-counter/countDown/description: Decrement the total by the increment value
ceci-daily-counter/unit/description: Name for items which are being counted.
ceci-daily-counter/increment/description: Count up or down with this number.
ceci-daily-counter/attributes/collection: The name of the collection to store the value
